communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the South Carolina Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

(1) Any signed and/or executed contract/agreement/partnership/offer letter/proposal/memorandum of understanding between Clemson University and Anthony Travel, and

(2) Any subsequent signed and/or executed contract extension/amendment/offer letter/memorandum of understanding of such, between Clemson and Anthony Travel.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ellen

title: GA CVR Collection (2020, 2022) (Pickens County Office Of Elections & Voter Registration)

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: GA CVR Collection (2020, 2022) (Pickens County Office Of Elections & Voter Registration)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Cast vote record (CVR) data for the following elections:
1. 2020 Nov General Election
2. 2022 Nov Midterm Election

Specifically, I’m looking for the full anonymized record of votes cast each election generated by the Dominion voting system. Forsyth County has an example of these records posted for the 2024 General Election under the name “Cast Vote Records (CVR) Report” at this link: https://www.forsythco.com/Departments-Offices/Voter-Registrations-Elections/Election-Results. Please let me know if you need any further clarification on the type of data that I am requesting.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Aleksandra Conevska

title: Contract for the Ohio Child Care Time Attendance and Payment Information System

communications.subject: Ohio Open Records Law Request: Contract for the Ohio Child Care Time Attendance and Payment Information System
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Ohio Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Please find the contract awarded for the State of Ohio Ohio Child Care Time Attendance and Payment Information System, https://ohiocctap.info/. The contract was awarded to KinderSystems, whose name changed to Firmament. KinderSystems was previously known as Controltec. 

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Toni Thompson

title: Reno e-scooter policies, data sharing agreements, applications, impound logs

communications.subject: Nevada Public Records Act Request: Reno e-scooter policies, data sharing agreements, applications, impound logs
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

The following documents relating to the operation of electric scooter (e-scooter) sharing systems within your city:

- copies of regulations, policies, or ordinances governing the operation of e-scooters and/or e-scooter shares within city limits, on a permanent or pilot basis
- applications or requests by electronic scooter companies to operate within city limits, including all attachments, submitted between January 1st, 2022 and the date this request is fulfilled
- data sharing agreements between the city and any past or present e-scooter operators in effect between January 1, 2022 and the date this request is fulfilled
- impound lists, logs, or registers of electric scooters impounded by the city

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Timothy

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

The following documents relating to the operation of electric scooter (e-scooter) sharing systems within your city:

- copies of regulations, policies, or ordinances governing the operation of e-scooters and/or e-scooter shares within city limits, on a permanent or pilot basis

- data sharing agreements between the city and any past or present e-scooter operators in effect between January 1, 2022 and the date this request is fulfilled
- impound lists, logs, or registers of electric scooters impounded by the city

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Timothy

title: Statewide Commercial Vehicle Inspection Data Request (Oct 1, 2024 – Present)

communications.subject: South Carolina Public Records Law Request: Statewide Commercial Vehicle Inspection Data Request (Oct 1, 2024 – Present)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the South Carolina Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

1. Total number of inspections statewide (October 1, 2024 – present), broken down by:

Level 1

Level 2

Level 3

2. Monthly inspection totals for each region across the state.

3. Comparison of current inspection numbers to the federal fiscal year goal.

4. Any memos, emails, or reports discussing whether the state is meeting its required inspection numbers for the federal fiscal year.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Edwin Chadwick
